/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of greenery and architecture over the viewer's head. Power lines crisscross above, adding to the urban feel of the scene. A blue truck is parked on the right side of the street, its vibrant color contrasting with the more muted tones of the surroundings. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
